export var listSuggest=function listSuggest(page,nOfItems){return function(dispatch){api.get("/adm/suggest?page=".concat(page,"&limit=").concat(nOfItems)).then(function(Response){var _Response$data=Response.data,docs=_Response$data.docs,infos=_Response$data.infos;dispatch({type:ACTIONS.LIST_SUGGESTS,suggests:docs,infosSuggests:infos});}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};};//FAVORITAR SUGGEST
